data.name: Groovy
data.detailed_description:
Join the Discord


About the Game

Groovy is a fast-paced precision platformer where you can manipulate the colors of the world. Avoid traps using speed boosts, jump boosts, and color powers alongside a robot surfer named Finn to defeat the Gloom.

Color manipulating platforming!


In Groovy you can manipulate the color of the world to alter the environment around you. This can be used to avoid traps, walk through walls and platforms, and more!

Take down the Gloom!


The gloom has infested the world of Groovy! It is up to you and your robot companion, Finn, to take them down!

Color palettes to customize your experience!


Everyone has their own preferences and, in a game about color, you should be able to choose the ones you look at. There are currently 8 color palettes and 9 player colors, with more to come!

Game Features

  • Single-player level campaign.
  • Color manipulating platforming.
  • Intense boss fights.
  • Collectable smileys within each level.
  • Reactive dialogue from Finn the robot.
  • 20 Color palettes giving you the ability to customize the game to your liking with more to come.
  • 9 Player colors, giving you even more control over your experience!
  • More to come!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8400 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 840M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Any modern dedicated GPU should be fine.
